title: OPEN DEMOCRACY With Hélène Landemore
itunes:author: Toby Buckle
itunes:summary: Does democracy have to be a matter of simply electing representatives? I'm joined by Hélène Landemore to discuss the problems with libertarianism, democracy in the workplace, & alternate models of democratic decision making.
itunes:subtitle: Does democracy have to be a matter of simply elec…
description: Does democracy have to be a matter of simply electing representatives? I'm joined by Hélène Landemore to discuss the problems with libertarianism, democracy in the workplace, & alternate models of democratic decision making.
